mapper.select: SELECT A.CO_CD, A.DL_CD, A.DL_CD_NM, A.SORT FROM BMS_DL_CD_INFO A, BMS_CO_CD_INFO B WHERE B.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CO_CD, A.SORT
SELECT CO_CD, DL_CD, DL_CD_NM, SORT, USE_YN, TXT_VAL1, TXT_VAL2, TXT_VAL2, REMARK FROM BMS_DL_CD_INFO A WHERE A.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} ORDER BY A.SORT
SELECT CO_CD, CO_CD_NM, REMARK FROM BMS_CO_CD_INFO ORDER BY CO_CD

SELECT DISTINCT ME.MENU_CD, ME.MENU_NM, ME.PARENT_MENU_CD, ME.LEVEL, ME.PROG_CD, PR.PROG_PH FROM (SELECT MENU_CD, MENU_NM, PARENT_MENU_CD, LEVEL, PROG_CD, USE_YN, SORT FROM BMS_MENU_MST WHERE SYSTEM_BIT = #{SSN_SYSTEM_BIT} || SYSTEM_BIT = 3) ME LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_PROG_MST PR ON ME.PROG_CD = PR.PROG_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_PROG_AUTH_INFO PA ON PR.PROG_CD = PA.PROG_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_USER_AUTH_CMPSTN UA ON PA.AUTH_CD = UA.AUTH_CD WHERE ME.PROG_CD IS NULL OR ME.PROG_CD = '' OR UA.USER_ID = #{SSN_USER_ID}
AND ME.USE_YN = 'Y' AND PR.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ME.MENU_CD, ME.SORT

SELECT * FROM BMS_CO_CD_INFO
AND CO_CD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND CO_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND USE_YN = #{USE_YN}
ORDER BY SORT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BMS_CO_CD_INFO(CO_CD, CO_CD_NM, SORT, USE_YN, REMARK) VALUES (#{CO_CD}, #{CO_CD_NM}, #{SORT}, #{USE_YN}, #{REMARK})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BMS_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND DL_CD = #{DL_CD_ORG}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BMS_DL_CD_INFO(CO_CD, DL_CD, DL_CD_NM, SORT, USE_YN, TXT_VAL1, TXT_VAL2, TXT_VAL3, REMARK ) VALUES (#{CO_CD}, #{DL_CD}, #{DL_CD_NM}, #{SORT}, #{USE_YN}, #{TXT_VAL1}, #{TXT_VAL2}, #{TXT_VAL3}, #{REMARK} )
INSERT INTO BM_MAIN_SETTING(USER_ID, MAIN_LAYOUT_PAGE_CODE, USE_YN_SHORTCUT) VALUES (#{USER_ID}, #{MAIN_LAYOUT_PAGE_CODE}, #{USE_YN_SHORTCUT})
